description: Allows designing and automatically deploying surveys via Email, SMS, Zalo after a customer completes a purchase or interaction.
associated_pain_points: We're struggling to collect customer feedback consistently after a purchase.
Our survey response rates are very low.
The manual process for sending feedback forms is too slow.

feature_name: AI Agent for FAQ & First Response
description: An AI-powered agent that automatically answers common and repetitive questions, deflecting them from human agents.
associated_pain_points: Our support agents are overwhelmed by the high volume of repetitive questions.
Customers have to wait too long for simple answers.
Hiring more agents is too expensive.

description: Analyzes feedback and operational data across all defined touchpoints to pinpoint sources of customer frustration or delight.
associated_pain_points: We have no clear idea which customer touchpoints are causing the most frustration.
We don't know where to invest to improve the customer experience.
When a problem happens, we don't know which stage of the process caused it.

description: Consolidates all touchpoints, past interactions, and feedback from a single customer into one comprehensive profile.
associated_pain_points: It's difficult to get a single view of a customer's interaction history when they contact us.
Our agents don't have enough context when talking to customers.
Customer data is scattered across different systems.

description: Automatically reads through thousands of open-ended responses (from surveys, chats, reviews) to extract key topics and sentiment (positive, neutral, negative).
associated_pain_points: Manually analyzing thousands of open-ended survey responses for common themes is too time-consuming.
We collect a lot of text feedback but don't know what it's about.
We can't quickly identify the main reasons for customer dissatisfaction.

description: Automatically gathers all public customer reviews from various platforms like Google, Facebook, and e-commerce sites into a single dashboard.
associated_pain_points: We get customer reviews on many platforms and it's hard to track them all.
We might be missing negative reviews posted on different sites.
It's difficult to see our overall rating across all channels.

description: Provides real-time response suggestions and knowledge base articles to human agents directly within their inbox during customer conversations.
associated_pain_points: New agents often respond to customers slowly and inconsistently.
Our agents struggle to find the right information while on a call or chat.
Training new support staff takes a lot of time.

description: Provides dashboards and reports on key operational metrics like First Response Time (FRT), Average Handle Time (AHT), and CSAT scores per agent.
associated_pain_points: We have no objective way to measure the performance of our support team.
We can't identify which agents are top performers and who needs more training.
We don't know if we are meeting our service level agreements (SLAs).

description: Uses unified customer data to create dynamic segments (e.g., VIPs, churn risks, new customers) to run targeted engagement campaigns via email, SMS, or Zalo.
associated_pain_points: It's hard for us to classify customers, like VIPs or churn risks, to run separate care campaigns.
Our marketing messages are generic and not personalized.
We want to proactively re-engage customers who haven't purchased in a while.

description: Converts every customer request from any channel (email, chat, social media) into a trackable ticket with a clear owner and status.
associated_pain_points: Customer requests from email, chat, or Facebook are often missed or no one is responsible.
There's no clear way to track the status of a customer's problem.
Two agents sometimes work on the same issue without knowing.
